trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherData>" name="<CipherData>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherData>" name="<CipherData>" href=""> </xref> elemento nella crittografia XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The CipherData class represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: La classe rappresenta CipherData il `<CipherData>` elemento nella crittografia XML.

trans-unit.source: It is a required element that provides the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: È un elemento obbligatorio che fornisce i dati crittografati.

trans-unit.source: It must either contain the encrypted data as base64-encoded text of the `<CipherValue>` element, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted data using the `<CipherReference>` element.
trans-unit.target: Deve contenere i dati crittografati come testo con codifica base64 del `<CipherValue>` elemento, o fornire un riferimento a una posizione esterna contenente i dati crittografati utilizzando il `<CipherReference>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: In many cases, you do not need to directly create a new instance of the CipherData class.
trans-unit.target: In molti casi, non è necessario creare direttamente una nuova istanza della classe CipherData.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.EncryptedXml%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> classes create instances for you.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.EncryptedXml%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>, e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classi creano automaticamente delle istanze.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.EncryptedXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A CipherData object can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, but not both.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > CipherData di un oggetto può avere un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>proprietà o un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>proprietà, ma non entrambi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a CipherData object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>viene generata se entrambi vengono assegnati a un oggetto CipherData.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object that represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto che rappresenta il `<CipherData>` elemento nella crittografia XML.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: The `<CipherData>` element is a required element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Il `<CipherData>` elemento è un elemento obbligatorio nella crittografia XML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> class using a byte array as the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*> value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"> </xref> classe utilizzando una matrice di byte come il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*>valore.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object that represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto che rappresenta il `<CipherData>` elemento nella crittografia XML.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: The constructor assigns the `cipherValue` value to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property as the actual encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore assegna il `cipherValue` valore per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>proprietà come effettivo dei dati crittografati.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `<CipherData>` element can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> child element, but not both.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il `<CipherData>` elemento può avere un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>elemento figlio, ma non entrambi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>viene generata se entrambe sono assegnate a un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: The encrypted data to use for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherValue>" name="<CipherValue>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: I dati crittografati da utilizzare per il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherValue>" name="<CipherValue>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The cipherValue parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The cipherValue parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*>proprietà è già stata impostata.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"></xref> class using a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"> </xref> classe utilizzando un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object that represents the `<CipherData>` element in XML encryption and assigns the `cipherReference` value to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto che rappresenta il `<CipherData>` elemento nella crittografia XML e assegna il `cipherReference` valore per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>proprietà.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> object represents the `<CipherReference>` element, which provides the location of the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>oggetto rappresenta il `<CipherReference>` elemento, che fornisce la posizione dei dati crittografati.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, but not both.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto può avere un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>proprietà o un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>proprietà, ma non entrambi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>viene generata se entrambe sono assegnate a un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"> </xref> oggetto da usare.

trans-unit.source: The cipherValue parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The cipherValue parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*> property has already been set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*>proprietà è già stata impostata.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CipherReference>" name="<CipherReference>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<CipherReference>` element identifies a source which, when processed, yields the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Il `<CipherReference>` elemento identifica un'origine che, durante l'elaborazione, produce i dati crittografati.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this element, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su questo elemento, vedere <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> property or a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> property, but not both.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto può avere un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>proprietà o un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>proprietà, ma non entrambi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>viene generata se entrambe sono assegnate a un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The value is encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Il valore è dati crittografati.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `<CipherData>` element can have either a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> or a CipherValue child element, but not both.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il `<CipherData>` elemento può avere un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>o un elemento figlio CipherValue, ma non entrambi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> is thrown if both are assigned to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>viene generata se entrambe sono assegnate a un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.target: La proprietà CipherValue è stata impostata più volte.

trans-unit.target: Carica dati XML da un <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> in un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The LoadXml method overwrites existing XML elements with the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo LoadXml sovrascrive gli elementi XML esistenti con il `value` parametro.
